sense.gloss: chest of drawers, bureau, cabinet, tansu, dresser
wardrobe (esp. for Western clothes), chest of drawers, clothespress, dresser, tallboy
small cabinet, chest of drawers, bureau
cupboard or chest for tea implements
ensign bearing a cluster of gourds (used by Toyotomi Hideyoshi)

sdata.j: ↑瓢箪↑↓ひょうたん↓から↑駒↑↓こま↓って↑言↑↓い↓うのかな、↑知人↑↓ちじん↓の↑紹介↑↓しょうかい↓で↑就職↑↓しゅうしょく↓↑決↑↓き↓まっちゃったんだよ。
sdata.e: I just got a great job because of an introduction from a friend. Sometimes things happen when you least expect it.

sdata.j: ↑大↑↓おお↓きいクモが↑箪笥↑↓たんす↓の↑後↑↓うし↓ろにいるよ。
sdata.e: A big spider lives behind the chest of drawers.
